Title: An Act Establishing a Ten-Bed Capacity Municipal Hospital in the Municipality of Antipas, Province of North Cotabato, to be Known as the Arakan Valley Municipal Hospital
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 367
An Act Establishing a Ten-Bed Capacity Municipal Hospital in the Municipality of Antipas, Province of North Cotabato, to be Known as the Arakan Valley Municipal Hospital
Section 1. There shall be established, under the direct supervision of the Director of Medical Services, a municipal hospital in the Municipality of Antipas, Province of North Cotabato, to be known as the Arakan Valley Municipal Hospital.
Section 2. The amount necessary for the construction and operation of the hospital not to exceed seven hundred fifty thousand pesos shall be funded out of the appropriations authorized by Batas Pambansa Blg. 131 and Batas Pambansa Blg. 230 for the Ministry of Health intended for new or expanded hospitals. Thereafter, such sum as may be necessary for its operation and maintenance shall be included in the annual General Appropriations Act.
Section 3. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: April 7, 1983
